message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first since I think you'll get good value out of it. How does $11,500 sound?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,500 is too low.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, can we meet at $10,250?
